titleStmt.title: A proclamation prohibiting all ecclesiastical meetings in synods or presbyteries, until authorized and ordered by the archbishop and bishops.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Edinburgh, and re-printed at London for Richard Thrale at the Crosse Keys entring into St. Pauls church yard,

notesStmt.note: Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 35; Steele notation: Letter, Authority Cross.
Dated at end: At Edinburgh, the ninth day of January, one thousand six hundred and sixty two.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Crosse Keys entring into St. Pauls church yard
